Welcome

Welcome to the Distributed Government Guide, a community resource helping public service teams build highly effective remote and telework environments.

Who it’s for

This guide is for local, state and federal:

  • Government team leaders
  • Government team members

How it’s organized

Each topic is simplified into three sections:

  • Checklist
  • Tools
  • Resources

Services

Training

Get customizable training for small or large groups at your agency on remote / telework best practices.

Browse training

Coaching

Get personalized coaching and implementation help for building effective distributed government teams.

Browse coaching

Consulting

Get one-on-one consulting for orientation on telework policies and best practices, along with recommendations for your agency.

Browse consulting
